comments.body: I do worry this `never` business is going to confuse users. I think we need to do better than just throwing up signatures with `never` in them.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +18,22 @@      p.a("s"); // Error
          ~~~
!!! error TS2345: Argument of type '"s"' is not assignable to parameter of type 'never'.
    }
